description: This file defines a Flutter page widget called MenuPage that displays a tabbed menu with categories, each showing a grid of menu items and allowing adding items to a cart using provider pattern.

classes.name: MenuPage
classes.description: A stateful widget representing the menu page with tabs for different categories.

classes.name: _MenuPageState
classes.description: State class for MenuPage managing tab controller and layout logic.

methods.name: initState
methods.description: Initializes the tab controller based on mock categories.

methods.name: dispose
methods.description: Disposes of the tab controller when the widget is removed.

methods.name: _gridCountForWidth
methods.description: Calculates number of grid columns based on available width.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree of the page, including header, tabs, and grid views of items.
